Summaries.eng: After six years of waiting, Hetalia is back! The countries of the world change into/become beautiful boys and take you through the most important events in history. Follow Italy, Germany and Japan in their crazy adventures!
Summaries.jpn: 6年の歳月を経て、「ヘタリア」が帰ってきた! 世界の国々が美少年に変身して、歴史上の最も重要な出来事をあなたに伝えます。イタリア、ドイツ、日本のハチャメチャな冒険を追いかけよう!

Titles.eng: Belgium, Luxembourg, Netherlands, and THAT Dog
Titles.jpn: ベルギーとルクセンブルクとオランダと"あの"犬

Summaries.eng: Belgium and Luxembourg tend to be at the mercy of others, so they pledge to become strong. Meanwhile, Belgium is curious about a certain dog that tourists often ask about.
Merry Christmas! Italy, Germany, and Japan take a look at how others spend Christmas. Italy visits Germany on December 31st.
Let's check on how everyone is spending New Year's. Japan also learns how to make Stollen from Germany before Christmas.

The World Conference is where countries gather and discuss how to resolve issues around the world. However, Italy is late once again. All the familiar faces show up and start off a new round of slapstick comedy!
Summaries.jpn: 世界中の問題を、みんなで協力して解決するための“世界会議”。 ところが今回もイタリアは遅刻してしまい…。 お馴染みのメンバーと繰り広げる、ドタバタコメディ開幕！

Summaries.eng: What do we do if extraterrestrials approach Earth? America's suggestion causes a commotion at the World Conference. Meanwhile, China attempts panda diplomacy with Japan.
Summaries.jpn: 今回も世界会議からお届け。もし地球外生命体が迫ってきたら…？アメリカの案に一同騒然！ 一方パンダ外交にチャレンジする中国は最終的にすごい恰好になっていって…。

Titles.jpn: チェコとスロバキア・前編

Summaries.eng:
Czech Republic and Slovakia have achieved their long-sought independence.
Is it "Czechoslovakia" or "Czechoslovakia"?
The Czech Republic and Slovakia's commitment to hyphens!
Summaries.jpn: 念願の独立を果たしたチェコとスロバキア。「チェコスロバキア」なのか「チェコ＝スロバキア」なのか。チェコとスロバキアが繰り広げる、ハイフンへのこだわりの回！

Titles.jpn: チェコとスロバキア・後編

Summaries.eng:
After discussing the hyphen issue, the Czech Republic and Slovakia have decided to live separately.
But there is loneliness in living alone ...
Summaries.jpn: ハイフン問題について話し合った結果、別れて暮らすことになったチェコとスロバキア。でもひとりで暮らす生活には寂しさもあって…。

Summaries.eng:
The time is the 18th century. The world has reached a time of change.
Great industry, starting with a small awareness and efficiency in Britain
Summaries.jpn:
時は18世紀。世界は変化の時を迎えていたーー。
イギリスの小さな気づきと効率化から始まる、素晴らしきかな、産業革命！

Summaries.eng:
Unable to keep up with the wave of the Italian Industrial Revolution, Romano travels to the United States.
Britain, on the other hand, sought improvements in industrial products and listened around.
Summaries.jpn: イタリアの産業革命の波についていけず、ロマーノはアメリカに渡る。一方イギリスは工業製品の改善点を求め、聞き回るのであった。

Summaries.eng:
Industrial Revolution in Russia. Russia, which was a little late for the waves, was swayed by a changing boss.
He requested that he be in Latvia in order to aim for industrial development.
Summaries.jpn:
ロシアでの産業革命。少し波に乗り遅れたロシアは、コロコロ変わる上司に振り回されていた。
工業の発展を目指すべく、ラトビアにあることをお願いするのであった。

Summaries.eng:
The United Kingdom realized that industrial products needed design. I learned from Italy, but I don't know what I'm talking about.
So I decided to invite Japan as an art coach.

Britain arrives at an industrial design that only machines can do.
On the other hand, the United States has become the number one in the world.
In everyone's car discussion, China seems to be good at it alone ...?

Romano, who went to the United States, was worried about Spain and consulted.
Portugal comes to visit such Spain. Somehow these two are similar ...?
The Industrial Revolution edition is now complete!

Spa powers Czech and Hungary.
To have a third party decide which is better.
On the other hand, Spain, which was told at the World Congress that there are too many olive groves, insists on its importance ...?

I want to know a little strange festival, so I ask everyone to introduce me to an interesting festival.
And Italy, who was worried about Germany's continued illness, decided to ask Japan for a spell and a prayer.
